com.liferay.apio.architect.router

Interface ItemRouter<T,S,U extends Identifier<S>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the model's type
    S - the type of the model's identifier (e.g., Long, String, etc.)
    U - the type of the resource's identifier. It must be a subclass of Identifier<S>.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CollectionResource<T,S,U>, ItemResource<T,S,U>, NestedCollectionResource<T,S,U,V,W>
    Deprecated. 
    As of 1.9.0, use ActionRouter instead

    @ConsumerType
 @Deprecated
public interface ItemRouter<T,S,U extends Identifier<S>>
    Represents the mapping between HTTP requests for an item resource and the functions that perform those requests.

    The type parameter provided for the resource ID must be unique in the application.

    You can add the different supported routes for the item resource via the itemRoutes(ItemRoutes.Builder) method.

    The union of an instance of this interface with a Representable creates a complete resource that behaves as its own API.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Deprecated. 
      As of 1.9.0, use ActionRouter instead

      • itemRoutes

        @Deprecated
ItemRoutes<T,S> itemRoutes(ItemRoutes.Builder<T,S> builder)
        Deprecated. As of 1.9.0, use ActionRouter instead
        Creates the ItemRoutes supported by the item resource. Use the provided routes builder to create the ItemRoutes instance.
        Parameters:
        builder - the routes builder to use to create the ItemRoutes instance
        See Also:
        ItemRoutes.Builder
